http://iso-relax.sourceforge.net/JARV/ defines a standard API for validation
against schemas, be they XSD, DTD, Relax NG or Schematron.

If Lenya used these facilities instead of the RelaxNG class, it could support
validation against different schemas in the form editors, and could get rid of
some helper classes
